text:
@mmpadellan @only1risa I agree but we have to move forward with determination to oust this man from the WH. He is going to kill us. I am not candy coating this. China is see a resurgence of the COVID-19 and it's not pretty. It's infecting people who has already had it. 
I wish I could say different.🙇‍♂️
